name: BLight (itch) (LeslieLlama)
description:
Made for the global game jam 2022!
A physics platformer where you hide from a burning sun by clinging to surfaces. the duality comes from the uh,, two surfaces of shadow and err,, light,, (had a bit of trouble with the theme this time round haha) 

Wasd - move
Space - Jump
Mouse - camera movement

Stay in the shadows to recover your stamina, and rush through the light to your next resting place
